评论详情: I bought this same blouse in a different color a few years ago.  It is roomy and comfortable.  I ordered this one last week in the same size as my first one.  It is MUCH smaller in the hips and neck hole.  Ironically I've dropped 20 lbs. since buying the first one (which is why it's so roomy), but even with that loss, this one in the same size is still too snug.
This blouse us well made. The material is little heavier then I thought it would be but I can live with that. It holds the color well if you wash in cold.
It’s very pretty but it was super big on me. I ordered a small.
Love the fit & like the good quality of shirt
Pretty embroidery, but very wide boxy shape. Sleeves were too floaty. Much larger in the torso than similar top I got, despite same size chart. I returned it.
Great fit, very comfortable, love the material!!
It is good quality and very beautiful.
Love the embroidery, the fit, the material! Great top! Color is beautiful, just like the images. Wright of material is light.
You never know what you’re going to get with Amazon, but this is absolutely beautiful! I want one in every color!

My friend bought a white version of this shirt. I liked it so much that I bought a white one for myself. Had tried on her medium shirt and chose a Large as I wear a Medium to Large for most shirts and I prefer this style to be a bit loose.  (5'5" 142#)

Love the colors and style. Bought for a theme day at work and got compliments on it.

I LOVE my blouse!! Took on a cruise to Mexico and it was such a great fit! Comfortable material, breathable and beautiful details! Loved the embroidery details…. Great value!

I absolutly loved it the only problem is it was not big enough i ordered 3XL since thats the biggest they have i weight 283lb and bust 46 C and it was a bit tight on boobs and its tight around the body  as u can see in pic soo size up and if u have bigger boobs its not gona fit i wish they had bigger i really love these shirts but they only come in 3 xl max…

Though I just ordered four of these shirts, I was nervous about what the quality and the fit would be. Those worries were unwarranted. I did measure, but found the actual measurements are a little bigger, which is what I was hoping for; they are the perfect size for me. I am a 40D, and the 3Xs fit me perfectly, are loose enough, and are flattering. Additionally, I was so pleased with the vivid colors, and the nice, breathable fabric, lovely embroidery, and quality stitching. The fabric is thicker than some other Mexican blouses I bought in Mexico that are a similar style. I mean thicker in a good way. These are not sheer, so no camisole is needed. I plan on hanging them to dry, or just barely drying on gentle to prevent any possible shrinkage. This seems like it would prevent the need to iron them. I am extremely pleased with these high quality, beautiful blouses. I already have two more picked out!
Size color great fit
This top runs very small. I got a 3x but it fit like a 1x

I love this blouse. Quality is amazing! I suggest you air dry because it will shrink in the dryer. I also suggest size up. You will have to press this because it wrinkles You dont find true cotton material much anymore.

This blouse is so beautiful. Looks like you spent a lot more than you actually paid. The material is lightweight and the crocheted style sleeve gives decent coverage. I have purchased a few in different colors and love them all. They wash well and I hang mine to dry. Every time I wear one,i always receive compliments. I Highly Recommend!
Once the shirt was washed the fabric was stiff. Even ironing didn’t help with the stiffness. I have never been to wear it and it is too late to return it. Very disappointing!

This top is just what I was looking for this summer - lovely Mexican peasant blouse with good fabric and crisp clean embroidery. Very colorful. And it was a good value. I have not washed it yet but plan to hand wash as I want to keep the embroidery detail looking like new. I purchased both an xxl and a 3x. I’m 5’7” and 215-220 lbs. I kept the 3 x because it was a bit longer and a bit looser, but the xxl would have worked ok.
it is very colorful nd can go a lot with other short,capris or pants that I have.
Love love love!!!! I wear a large or extra large I got a large and it fits perfect the colors are beautiful. I purchased two more.
I bought this for a cultural festival. It was perfect. I wouldnt wear it in extreme heat as the material is pretty thick, but for the fall or cooler weather it is adorable and perfect
I love my top especially its sleeves. I’ve gotten many compliments including asking where I got it. I just wish it was machine washable so I could wear it more often.
I was very happy with the quality of this blouse. Very vibrant colors. The embroidery is very well done!  True to size.
Bright and beautiful and very well priced. I loved this too but it is long on me. I'm just 5'3". I'll need to hem it.
I get lots of compliments on this top. It fits as it claims, the material is comfortable, it washes nicely, and the embroidery is well done.

This is a cute top but even after laundering and using fabric softener the fabric feels rough and stuff. Maybe over time it will soften. The fabric is a nice weight tho, and not sheer. Seems to be well made and the embroidery is nice. Barely any shrinking in laundering in cold water.
Beautiful embroidery but the fit was too big in a small. I’m petite 5ft1in 125lbs.
Very cute shirt though
Love the shirt. Quality of fabric is good, not to thin. The fit is great. Love the blue color.
Excellent product and doesn’t look cheap
Maybe that was how it was supposed to be but it was like putting on a box shaped shirt

I am 240lbs and 5’4 and this shirt was well fitting and flattering. I’m also very large chested but this shirt gave a lot of space. I get hot easy and although the fabric is sturdy and doesn’t have any stretch, it was breathable. Definitely order a size up if you are worried about it being tight. There’s zero stretch but it hangs so nice. Absolutely loved it and would buy other colors.
Ordered a size larger than what I normally wear. Fits very comfortably. Nice quality fabric and excellent finished embrodery. Fast shipping. Will buy another color.

I normally take a women's large but buy XL for comfort in some cases.  recommended size for this blouse was XXL which I bought.  TOO BIG.  I ended up returning it because it was big, boxy and not flattering at all.  The design and colors were vibrant and festive, but the fit too big.
Great top! Fits well, washes well and looks GREAT!! Many compliments. Fabric is great quality too!!!

评论概述: Cute top but wrinkled easily and faded a bit when washed.
评论详情: I washed the top in cold water on gentle cycle when I received it.  I noticed the blue of it faded a bit from the wash.  It faded more in some areas that others, making it look a bit uneven.  A few loose strings on the sewed flowers but nothing that wasn't easily trimmed up.  The top was cute but a bit stiff.  It did require an  iron.
I love this top and had lots of compliments at my reunion!
This is so cute and well-made. I ordered it for cinco de mayo, and it came overnight.
I bought this for a Cinco de Mayo party. The pattern is pretty. The shirt is really thick and heavy, and a little scratchy, so not really comfortable. The fit is also a bit boxy.
I was very impress with the quality, I size up because of my large chest but it is true to size, everyone complimented and love it!
Very nice embroidery and a comfortable fit too.
Finally a top that is not paper thin. Washed in cold and hung dryed still fits perfectly. I will buy another color.
This top is adorable and I got so many compliments at our Mexican fiesta party. I ordered a size up and it fit perfectly!

评论概述: It’s a beautiful shirt but it runs small
评论详情: Beautiful shirt but it runs small in the chest area.
I loved this blouse. It’s colors, fabric and the design. It was an excellent purchase. A little wrinkled after washing it but nothing you can’t fix by ironing it gently.

I absolutely loved this shirt!  Great price and great fit.  I ordered 3x so it was true to size.  My only complaint is that after I washed it the shirt shrunk.  I hung it to dry too so it’s a little disappointing.  I just looked at the label and it says professional dry clean so I guess that’s on me.  So fyi.  Other than that, great shirt!

I ordered this for a Cinco de Mayo and because my son was having a Cinco de Mayo graduation party. I wore it but I could barely get it on. It was super tight across the chest area and my arm s and armpit area was super tight. Not sized right for American sized. I ordered a 3x , which is what I always wear.

Please ignore my previous request as I received the blouse by mail today vs the delivery person’s notes that it was delivered to my front porch yesterday.  The blouse is beautiful, but the delivery was deceiving.  Thank you so much!
There’s no give to this material so it was a little snug but still fit. Size up for a relaxed fit. Super cute colors and great embroidery!

I usually wear a large so that's what I ordered. It fit loose, a medium may have worked but I kept it in case it shrunk in the wash. I received many compliments. The sleeves are adorable and the embroidery was beautiful.
Super cute embroidery details, I wanted to love it.  I ordered based on the size chart and it was huge.  If I would have ordered my normal size it might have fit.  Fabric is very stiff and coarse.
Shirt is not true to size really bummed

评论概述: Wow!  This is  a great shirt!
评论详情: The shirt was just delivered, and while I didn't buy it for the packaging, I did note it was nicely packaged in a heavy zip top bag. The shirt itself was a pleasant surprise. I ordered it hoping it would be okay but didn't really expect it would be so nice.  Well made, good weight fzbric, and really well-done embroidery.  For $20!  It is a bit large, if it came in extra-small I'd probably exchange it but thus kind of shirt should be loose fitting anyway. It's going to look great with a pair of jeans for an upcoming Cinco de Mayo party.  If you're hesitating to buy this shirt, I say go for it.

I love my fiesta pullover blouse! It fits perfect! I'm going to the flambeau parade tonight and came just in time! The embroidery is real nice and the length is perfect. I am 5'7" tall and 180 lbs. And nothing needs to be adjusted.

I got a lot of compliments on this blouse. It arrived very quickly and it fit well. I enjoyed wearing it. I have not washed it yet. However it appears to be well made. There are no raw seams and it was as described. In fact I went back and ordered one in black. I would recommend it.
Comfortable and received compliments.
I like the color, the fit is ok but size runs smaller than what it says.
This shirt is so pretty. You get what you see. Beautiful stitching, bright colors and fits great
